channel.title: Herriman Utah on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Herriman Utah on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Herriman Fire (Utah) map and current news
item.description: There is a large fire near Herriman, Utah, known as the Herriman Fire or the Machine Gun Fire. Some details. On twitter, follow #herrimanfire . Maps are being produced with evacuation zones. Look for one that loads fast, which means that a typical output from a GIS system with every road marked in loving detail is not what you want.  See e.g. 800kb map hosted on Google Docs 8.1mb map hosted on Scribd, a copy of the official map, loads faster 8.
